title: What year did PlayStation 5 come out? - Quora

response.answer_text: *sigh* Seriously? Is Google dead now or something? Can Quora moderation employ some humans to look over content instead of leaving the bots to do it? We'd be able to weed out questions like this one… The PlayStation 5 has yet to be released to the public. It has been recently confirmed that the console will release late in 2020, so expect a quarter 4 release window (between September and December of 2020). If the original poster sees this: a simple Google search would have answered your question; please use common sense when posting questions that can potentially be considered “dumb” questions, like this one.
